description: Electrical engineering major from Forsyth County (north Atlanta). Fall'13 AM class, BK 1954. Co-oping out of Atlanta in the Fall of 2014 will be around for game days, wouldn't miss those for the world.
aspects: My favorite part of Lambda Chi is the strong relationships I have built not only with my AM class, but also many of the older brothers. Coming by the house after a long day of work is a great feeling and allows me to unwind.
involve: Co-Op with the Dennis Group, LCC
name: Marcus Fisher
